SEARCH
Package pages

Interface iPage

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddMenuItemPage, AdminAccessPage, AdminManageBranchPage, AdminManagePaymentPage, AdminManageStaffPage, BrowseBurgerPage, BrowseCategoriesPage, BrowseDrinksPage, BrowseSetMealPage, BrowseSidesPage, CustomerPage, EditMenuItemsPage, EditOrderPage, MainPage, ManagerAccessPage, SelectBranchPage, SelectCategoriesPage, StaffAccessPage, StaffLoginPage, StaffProcessOrderPage, ViewOrderPage, ViewStaffDetailsPage
public interface iPage
This interface will be implemented by all pages. Every page should have a method to view the menu options, and the corresponding switch/case or if/else logic to handle the choices
Author:
Siah Yee Long

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handleInput(String choice)
    To handle the user input
    void
    viewOptions()
    To view menu options of the page.

  • Method Details

    • viewOptions

      void viewOptions()
      To view menu options of the page. Normally have the ASCII art here

    • handleInput

      void handleInput(String choice)
      To handle the user input
      Parameters:
      choice - note that this is of type String such that it can handle "b", "quit", "exit" etc.
